body_html: It seems generally fine but can I ask what the value is of doing this separate from the PR that does the actual unification? It will just be disturb my build scripts and I'll have to do fresh builds everywhere since the paths won't match anymore. It's a minor discomfort but just wondering why not do it all in one push
